document_data.name: Myrinjar sherry
document_data.mainbody: '''Myrinjar sherry''' was a type of fortified sherry [[wine]] produced in the city of [[Myrinjar]].{{Cite polyhedron/135/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms|8}}
document_data.Description: This wine was flavored with both [[cranberry|cranberries]] and [[raspberry|raspberries]] from the bogs east of Myrinjar. Additionally, [[cherry|cherries]] were often bottled inside of the wine.
